    primitives.Color traceRays​(java.util.List<primitives.Ray> rays, elements.Camera camera)
    An updated version of the traceRay function- uses all rays in the sent list to calculate the color

    • calcColor

      public primitives.Color calcColor​(java.util.List<primitives.Ray> rays, elements.Camera camera)
      An updated version of calcColor- uses all colors of all intersections with all rays in the sent list to find the final color of the point
      Parameters:
      rays - the list of rays we use to calculate the color
      camera - will tell us if we're using the DOF algorithm or not
      Returns:
      Color the final color of the point
